entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mono] Arm64 AdvSimd - Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #93081
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add a library for working with pictures #93075
  • [API Proposal]: A native(ish) coroutine integration #93073
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 3 Oct 2023 #93072
  • Inliner improvements in .NET 9.0 #93069
    9.0.0
  • App stops responding - ExceptionCode: 80000003 (Break instruction exception) #93059
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate methods with short arguments #93057
  • Central package versioning support missing in targets for Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator #93054
  • [mono][aot] Improve toolchain configuration in Mono AOT compiler #93052
    9.0.0
  • DEREF_OF_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/lsrabuild.cpp #93048
    9.0.0
  • dotnet 7 causes Segmentation fault on arm64 platforms #93047
  • [API Proposal]: Billboard Lefthanded APIs for System.Numerics.Matrix4x4 #93046
  • [NativeAOT] osx-arm64 build error: compact unwind compressed function offset doesn't fit in 24 bits #93044
  • Freezes When Blazor WebAssembly publish #93076

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `KeyValuePair<K, V>.Deconstruct` #93080
  • JIT: Invalid smnegl transformation #92537
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Intrinsify GetType().TypeHandle.Value and typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #5973
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: GC.RegisterNonGCSegment (custom NonGC heaps) #92650
    Future
  • [Test Failure] Long running test: SslStreamMemoryConformanceTests.ReadWrite_Success_Large #89092
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator Docs should be very clear about how return values / HResult on the managed method translates to the native signature #89314
    8.0.0
  • [Mono WASM + AOT] `Environment.Exit` does not work together with exception handling #90692
    8.0.0
  • SslStream does not have Read override with Span #79072
    Future
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] The type "IPNetWork" exists in both "System.Net.IPNetwork" and "System.Net.Primitives" #93022
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT tests failing when to compile `aot-instances.dll.bc` when using `-O0` #93023
  • Release System.ExecutionEngineException Blazor Hybrid iOS ComponentProperties.SetProperties(in ParameterView, object)+SetProperty(object, PropertySetter, string, object) #74015
    9.0.0
  • MAUI + Blazor | IOS Release throws on virtual Parameter setter #78712
    9.0.0
  • jitstress failing widely with NRE #92990
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Wrong architecture libc++ bundled with wasm cross-compilers on linux-arm64 #93015
    8.0.0
  • Regression in handling of `UseDefaultCredentials` by `HttpClientHandler` in .NET Core #84545
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case05/case05.sh #62311
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT's implementation of `TrimmerRootAssembly` is too aggressive #92271
  • DllImport on Linux ignoring an already loaded module #92995
  • DEREF_AFTER_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/hwintrinsiccodegenxarch.cpp #93050
  • Use framework provided by the SDK #67080
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostFactoryResolverTests #73420
    Future
  • Missing *LeftHanded Equivalents in System.Numerics.Matrix4x4 #92402

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93088
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Update release/8.0-rc1 to release/8.0 in perf.yml #93087
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update JIT debug helpers #93086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a typo in the ETW manifest #93085
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove duplicated stores #93084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert AllConfigurations and NETFX jobs to use the global build templates #93082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Get rid of static constructor in Task<T> #93079
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [Android][build] Fix android package name containing `-` #93077
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Support retbuf optimization for non 'lvIsTemp' locals #93071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Resolve x64 libc++ being included with linux-arm64 to browser-wasm cross-compiler #93070
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Move internal BitOperations.LeadingZeroCount({U}Int128) #93068
    area-System.Numerics
  • [Mono] Enable intrinsics support for multiplication and division for Vector2/4 by scalar + refactor #93061
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add tests for all possible types of negative arguments #93058
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix passing CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE in runtime tests using Ninja #93051
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ServerClosesConnection_ThrowsHttpProtocolException Test Race Fix #93049
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Optimize the managed hash implementations. #93042
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Fix invalid smnegl transformation #93003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Re-add emsdk key to NuGet.config #93074
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [Mono] Disabled failing tests on Mono Android and interpreter lanes to keep CI green #92728
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Merged stores: Fix alignment-related issues and enable SIMD where possible #92939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pass /OPT:NOREF for DEBUG VS builds #93053
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add WaitAsync on Read operation of StreamConformanceTests.ReadWrite #93056
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Pass "is official build" variable to AllConfigurations leg in the official build. #93078
    blocking-official-build, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] WBT: Avoid using `-O0` in tests #93026
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • CI: Do not run `CrossDac` job for mono, or wasm changes. #93045
    area-Infrastructure
  • SPMI: Fix wrong SPMI replay result check #93062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add ordering side effects in fgMorphExpandInstanceField #92998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][workloads] Allow overriding the current version #93031
    area-Build-mono
  • Try to resolve x64 libc++ being included with linux-arm64 #93027
    area-Build-mono
  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update area tizen owners #93055
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [browser] streaming compile wasm bit earlier #93000
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use relative path for blazor-template #93060
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't widen to Int128 in CastCache #92984
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix conflicting test assembly name in classloader tests #93012
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing negative/positive numbers to methods. #92754
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove ActiveIssue on HostFactoryResolver tests #92983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add -skipcrossarchnative and -verbose options #90554
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove the MarshallingGeneratorFactoryKey type and construct the generator factory during the "source emit" stage #93034
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Split the MarshalAsParser into two classes #93038
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbPrev and bbNext private #93032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow experimenting with different CSE subsets #92918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndReplicateToVector64x* and LoadAndReplicateToVector128x* APIs #92909
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sigmoid and TensorPrimitives.SoftMax #93029
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-installer, area-codeflow
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use SequenceEqual in BigInteger.Equals #91416
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Change SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException server to Loopback #93025
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • `readonly`-ify fields based on whole program view #92923
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #92980
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • CBOR Writer: Use canonical NaN representation for NaN values #92934
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • [mono][hotreload] Generate seq_points if we don't have pdb information from HotReload #93039
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix calling of static delegates with simd arguments #92927
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #93006
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mono][hotreload] Adding test case failing #93035
    area-EnC-mono
  • [browser] drop `create_task_callback` #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • System.Formats.Cbor package's readme #93021
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Try rooting less stuff for reflectable method signatures #92994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] WBT inner loop improvements #92968
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Does dotnet/runtimelab want to host WIT code gen issues #2409

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM Merge sep 23 #2396
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • `dotnet publish --no-build` no longer working with `net8.0-macos` target framework #35705
  • Error while running dotnet test on Ubuntu-latest in GitHub actions #29742
  • Enable CLI config to disable preview warnings #10238
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix concurrent tool restore and version range error #35884
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • fix the versionRange resolve method for tool package downloader #35883
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add tests for failing tool restore scenarios #35882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat old TFMs as unsupported by ILLink analyzers #35837
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Adjust trim/aot warning messages (#35186) #35595
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2283650 #35854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35835
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow all SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add workload garbage collection tests for side-by-side manifests #35857
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pass failure message reported from from getApplyUpdateCapabilities in WASM to dotnet watch #35755
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Spec LDM decision that collection expressions targeting IEnumerable<T> implement nongeneric IList #7577

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected "Expression is a value" error while attempting to assign to a member through a ref returning property in VB #70257
  • Unexpected order of evaluation and result of compound assignment to a ref returning property in VB #70256
  • Cannot build deeply nested hierarchies with .NET 8 RC 1 SDK (e.g. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Odata) #70254
  • Collection expressions targeting readonly interfaces should provide an instance implementing nongeneric IList #70253
    17.9
  • Xml comments on classes generated by source generators are not included in the .xml file build output #70249
  • Add MemberNotNullAttribute support for IQueryable<T> methods #70246

Closed

  • Error when using collection-expression for an array-typed attribute argument. #69133
    17.8
  • `ImmutableList<T>` on net7 and compiler-expression-conversions. #69521
    17.8
  • Annoying completion when trying to insert a semi-colon in a switch expression #70224
  • CSharpGeneratorDriver - possible glitch re "features" (causes "Inconsistent syntax tree features" failure) #69906
  • Strange output for NormalizeWhitespace for `1 is var i` #70135
    Backlog
  • Character offset not taken into account in Location.GetMappedLineSpan #69248
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for using Mono to load .NET Framework projects #70263
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix build race #70261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: empty Span optimization #70260
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Pool and configure the pipe we use when streaming data to/from OOP. #70259
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Change checksums into structs #70245
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Collection expressions: analyze nullability of element assignments #70192
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Use simpler PP directives in checksum factory #70258
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid returning checksums unnecessarily during OOP calls. #70255
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix incorrect isInsideDelimiters assumption in MoveCaretToSemicolonPosition #70250
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Fix checksum hierarchy #70239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: ImmutableArray optimization #70222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: optimize List<T> construction #70197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Load solutions out-of-proc #70240
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70244
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include sqlite binaries to enable persistent storage in vscode #70162
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix GetDocumentationComment returns unresolved doc reference for inheritdoc typeparamref #70230
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] In static render mode, scripts are not loaded onto the page after navigation. #51175
  • RazorComponentResult gives error: Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #51174
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51172
  • Make RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentRenderMode's renderMode parameter nullable #51170
    8.0.0
  • Add logging in SecureDataFormat #51169
  • Schema URL in templated launchSettings.json should use HTTPS #51168
  • Remove the top level Components folder from the Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App template #51167
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: Javascript/css not compressing when using Brotli web.config #51166
    .NET 9 Planning
  • DataProtection - PersistKeysToFileSystem is not working properly inside K3S with shared file system #51165
  • Blazor Web App: AuthorizeRouteView NotAuthorized #51164
  • Swap the order of the http/https launch profiles? #51159
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Register_create New Account_Status Messages: Narrator is not announcing error message appeared when required fields are kept empty. #51156
    8.0.0
  • Support System.DirectoryServices on Linux #51155
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Use A Local Account to Login_Label or instructions: No visual instructions are provided for the sighted users to identify the input fields are required fields. #51153
    8.0.0
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Counter_Counter Section_Name role value: The purpose of the "click me" button is not clear from the provided label #51152
    Backlog
  • Using @ref and @rendermode on the same call site produces an unhelpful error message #51151
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • [Blazor] In static render mode, scripts are not loaded onto the page after navigation. #51126
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mvc #51058
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #51154
  • The app can't work when I create a default .Net 8 Blazor Web App and select use interactive Webassembly compoennts #50986
  • Blazor Web App and Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI #51161
  • NotFound does not work for Blazor Web App #51163
  • Uninstalling windows hosting bundle not working #50826
  • [Blazor] Finalize behavior of JavaScript initializers for Blazor Web apps #50187
    8.0.0
  • Blazor static SSR multiple forms and "transient" data #51162
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 7.0.11 requires >= 7.0.0 of Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect #50943
  • dotnet-8 #51150
  • Improve exception message on exceptions produced during rendering when there is Virtualization + DynamicComponent #50759
  • High Network Usage in Blazor Application #50872

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix default reconnect display not showing after enhanced navigation #51173
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Change Interactivity option text in Blazor web template #51160
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Rename "ASP.NET Core Web App" to "ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages)" #51157
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51139
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51138
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 7.0.13
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • MockTimeProvider -> FakeTimeProvider #51147
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • refactor addedToDom #51095
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Emit action attribute when not explicit. #51130
    area-blazor
  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `dotnet dump analyze` commands like `pe` crashes the debugging session #2315
    Future

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use new ModuleInfo.TryCreateResourceRoot in DataReader impl #4295

Updated

  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification - Automated `Collect` Testing #4253

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Offer workflow for reusable projections that access nested navigation properties #31982
  • Add a way to use another property as a template for facets #31978
  • NullReferenceException when accessing navigation property with compiled models and ambiguous type names #31977
  • Combination of split queries and limit/order leads to inconsistent inclusions #31975
  • Cosmos query projection on owned entity list throws InvalidOperationException variable 'jArray1Object' of type 'Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject' referenced from scope #31974
  • Provide a way to return a joined result #31972

Closed

  • JSON column issue with SetTableName() #30391
    8.0.0
  • Problems using Circuit as entity name with OwnsMany and OwnsOne #30107
    8.0.0
  • Configuring HaveConversion convention causes OwnsMany to throw NullRef #28515
    8.0.0
  • EF Core and DDD --> .OwnsMany() call on other aggregate root ids (in value object form) throws 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' when aggregate performing the .OwnsMany() call has its own ids referenced by another aggregate root #30373
    8.0.0
  • ModelBuilder.Entity does not return generic instance. #31626
  • ExecuteUpdate: Add SetProperty overload that accepts a property name or property info directly (no lambda) #30149
  • [8.0-rc.1] 'dbcontext optimize' does not preserve `convertsNulls` #31942
    8.0.0
  • GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #29638
    7.0.13
  • Possible finalizer thread stuck on System.RuntimeMethodHandle.Destroy #31782
    6.0.23
  • Memory Issue with EF Core 7 DbContext ServiceProviderCache #31539
    6.0.24
  • Memory leak in EntityMaterializerSource #31866
    6.0.x
  • Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #30996
    7.0.12
  • UTF8 case insensitive like operator in sqlite #31843

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Unwrap closures when translating expression trees for compiled model. #31981
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Synthesize concurrency tokens for derived tables in TPC and TPT #31979
    Servicing-consider
  • Remove quirks from main #31976

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30391 - JSON column issue with SetTableName() #31951
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Allow creating properties implicitly even when type is configured as non-property #31968
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Preserve `convertsNulls` in the compiled model #31967
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31965
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31964
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Treat SQL Pool warmup/pause errors as transient #31739
